1.content: You are in your living room watching inspector gadget and wish you could be in it and meet penny, you kind of had a little crush on her and thought she was kinda cute. You then get tired and fall asleep on the couch and you wake up and notice everying is really big. What is going on?? Then you hear loud footstep earthquakes, then a shadow came over you who was it?
1.title: Wishes

11.content:
She was about to step on you but notice, something tiny on the floor(You!) She moved her foot back and set her foot down, witch cause a earthquake(Boom!).
Is that a bug? She then crouch down, to get a closer look at you. Wait your not a bug, your a tiny human she said in shock.
Please don't be afraid little fellow, I won't hurt you, she lays out her hand for you jump onto. What do you do?
11.title: It was penny!

111.content: You now were on her hand and when penny saw this, she lifted you up to her face as she standed up to full height. She saw your tiny form and said, Ooh your so cute! I could eat you up. Then her stomach growls, I'm kind of hungrey. You said, "Your going to eat me? Look I'm not tasty food for your belly." Penny responded, What? No no I'm not going to eat you, I may be very hungrey, but I can control myself. Penny's stomach growl again but this time even louder, Penny looking at with hungrey eyes, trying not to eat you. Penny licks her lips, Penny says to herself, "control yourself, control yourself penny." Does she give into temptation?
111.title: Jump on her hand

1111.content: I'm sorry little guy, but I'm very hungry and you look delicious, who wouldn't a scrumptious treat like you? With that Penny licks her lips again and opens her mouth with saliva dripping down onto her revealed pink wet tongue. She closes her eyes and said "~aahhhhh" tossed you into her mouth and closed it shut. She started to toss you around in her mouth from left to right cheek "Mmmmm so yummy". Penny sat down on the couch, and was getting tired of your taste, so she desides it's time to swallow her tiny treat. She then lifts you to the roof of her mouth tilts her head back. You start to slide down her tongue, did she swallow you?
1111.title: Yes

11111.content:
With a GULP you are on a trip to her stomach, after a few seconds you plop into her stomach. You saw her juices digesting her food, you saw some chick and mash potatoes being turned into mush. Growl!
On the outside Penny pat her stomach and lifted her shirt up and shaked her hips left and left, shaking her stomach's content. Thanks for being my food, I think my stomach likes you. Have fun, hope to see you on the other end tomorrow, I know it takes about. 2 hours in my stomach and 5 hours in my intestines, so it pretty much takes a day for me to digest the food, in my digestive track. Then her stomach rumbled what is happing?
11111.title: Yes down you go

info.brief_description: You make a wish that you could be in the inspector gadget tv show, but not what you expect
info.description: You are in your living room watching inspector gadget and wish you could be in it and meet penny, you kind of had a little crush on her and thought she was kinda cute. You then get tired and fall asleep on the couch and you wake up and notice everying is really big. What is going on?? Then you hear loud footstep earthquakes, then a shadow came over you who was it?
